channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Thursday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: President Trump announced a reprieve on some 'reciprocal' tariffs, lifting the S&P 500 to its biggest gain since 2008. What CNBC is watching Thursday.

item.title: United Airlines, Microchip Technology lead the stocks posting 20%-plus reversals on Trump tariff pause
item.description: More than a dozen companies swung more than 20% from their lows to their highs in Wednesday's furious rally.

item.title: Trump's morning 'buy' call nets huge returns for those who listened
item.description: CNBC calculated how much well-known holdings rallied between when Trump posted and session highs.

item.title: Bill Ackman praises Trump's tariff pause: 'Thank you on behalf of all Americans'

item.title: Costco could be tariff winner and steal market share if inflation rises, says Loop Capital
item.description: Costco stock has slipped less than 1% so far in 2025, and has fared far better than the broader market.
